__e: It wasn't night then I was in the woods and he said to me...
One way or another, these dreams seem to be about trying to get out of the woods and back home.
"It's all right, I can get off here, go through the arboretum and I'm back."
Here's the woods behind our factory isn't there an old bus there?
I told you not to enter the forest again.
I do not want you back to that forest again, you hear me?
